IsFulfillmentCenter.description: If location is a fulfillment center

IsWarehouseManaged.description: If the location is warehouse managed.

Address1.description: The first line of the stock location address.

Address2.description: The second line of the stock location address, if applicable.

City.description: The city where the stock location is located.

County.description: The county or region where the stock location is located.

Country.description: The country where the stock location is situated.

ZipCode.description: The postal code of the stock location.

CountInOrderUntilAcknowledgement.description: The flag indicating whether to count stock in order until it is acknowledged.

FulfilmentCenterDeductStockWhenProcessed.description: The flag indicating whether to deduct stock from the fulfilment center when processed.

IsNotTrackable.description: The flag indicating whether the stock location is not trackable.
